views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

Using an added Force Touch shortcut, This tweak will allow you to launch an application in "safe mode", resulting in no extensions, tweaks, and anything else loaded by CydiaSubstrate being loaded into the app.

Configure options from Settings.

Source code available

Fix bug causing pref bundle to not work on A12 devices Add support for A12 Devices -Allow installation on earlier firmware.
- Add support for iOS 11

Credit to David Goldman (DavidGoldman on GitHub) for finding the hooks necessary to launch the app in safe mode
